ace.concurrency

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ace.Ace
      • ace.concurrency.Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParallelScheduler, SerialScheduler

    public class Scheduler
extends Ace
    Scheduled thread pool wrapper class.
